## common.getBlockTypeCounts() function

Get a map of all the block's descendants mapping their type to the number of children with that type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getBlockTypeCounts(block: Block, opt_stripFollowing?: boolean): {
    [key: string]: number;
};
```

</th><th>

</td><td>

</td><td>

The block to map.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

opt\_stripFollowing


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optionally ignore all following statements (blocks that are not inside a value or statement input of the block).


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

{ \[key: string\]: number; }

Map of types to type counts for descendants of the bock.
